name: SouthpoleSnowrun
description:
SouthpoleSnowrun is a platformer-game where the main goal is to complete the level as fast as possible, and at the same time to collect valuable items while avoiding any dangers.  Don't fall to a ice-cold water of Antarctic, or get crushed by ice-shelfs when jumping on them! And remember to watch out for angry icebears... or to be knocked out by snowballs.

Controls:
